channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sever lack of safety for cyclists, 28th August
item.description:
On all cycleway junctions with roads along this section of the A40 - Benhall gardens, Tennyson Road there is a significant safety risk for cyclists. Additional signage is required to make it clear to road and cycle user sof the priorities. There are almost daily regular accidents/ incidents at these junctions as cars coming onto and off of the A40 do not consider road markings and the raised surface which cyclists may be on. This is a dangerous issue that will soon result in severe harm to a cyclist.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Kingsley Gardens, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: The triangle and circle signs are obscured with dirt., 28th August
item.description:
Hello, the triangle (Level 3) and circle (Level 1) signs on approach to Coombe Hill traffic lights FROM Tewkesbury are obscured with dirt, and are difficult to see, especially from a distance on approach on the bend. Would it be possible for them to be cleaned please ? They are the speed limit and traffic light signs. Thankyou !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is missing (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Large weeds growing on pavement and curb side, 28th August
item.description:
The weeds are worst outside 67 Shearwater Grove, GL3 1DD. The whole of the road has an issue with weeds along the curb side. This has been going on for a few years with no one coming out to clear the weeds.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shearwater Grove, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excess amounts of litter on the verges, 28th August
item.description:
There is an excess amount of litter on the verge along the A40 Golden Valley Bypass. This is not a good look for anyone travelling along this road and nothing seems to be done about it. This has been like this for some time and needs constant monitoring
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 28th August
item.description:
Customer has called in and has mentioned that Wales and west has gone out and marked the pavement, they have spoken to the guys on site and they mentioned that there is a possiability of them moving their asset to the side of the property. Is wondering if they check whether that there is any property land underneath.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No revised speed limit signs, 28th August
item.description:
From Brickhampton Golf Club entrance to Glos. Airport turning. No new speed limit signs. It is an obligation as per Government guidelines to sign speed limit reductions to keep motorists informed. It is necessary for highway safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor
